title: How to Buy a Pet in Mass Effect 2

steps.headline: Travel to the Citadel.
steps.description: The space station is located in the Serpent Nebula on the galaxy map. The galaxy map can be accessed on the Combat Information Center (CIC) deck of the Normandy.

steps.headline: Go to Level 27 in the Zakera Ward.
steps.description: You can walk there or use a fast-travel transit terminal (found in various locations) to teleport there.

steps.headline: Enter "Citadel Souvenirs" and access the terminal.
steps.description: If you have enough Renegade or Paragon points, speak to the shopkeeper about getting a store discount. Select the blue (Paragon) or red (Renegade) dialogue option to persuade her.

steps.headline: Purchase pets from the item list.
steps.description:
The prices for each pet are as follows:
Space Hamster can be bought for 9,200 credits, or 7,666 credits with a store discount. Illium Skald Fish and Thessian Sunfish can be bought for 500 credits, or 416 credits with a store discount. Note that the Thessian Sunfish will not appear in the store inventory until after you've completed the "Horizon" mission.

methods.name: Buying Pets at Memories of Illium

steps.headline: Travel to llium.
steps.description: It is located in the Tasale System of the Crescent Nebula on the galaxy map. The galaxy map can be accessed on the CIC deck of the Normandy.

steps.headline: Head to the door near the stairs that leads to Liara's office.
Walk through the docking authority section to the next door.
Go to the farthest kiosk on the left, located in the merchant's section.
Speak to Ereba, the Asari next to the kiosk.
steps.description: If you have enough points in either the Paragon or Renegade personality ranges, you can persuade her to deal with her boyfriend troubles. Both dialogue options lead her to give you the discount.

steps.headline: Access the kiosk and choose the pet from the item list.
steps.description: The only pet available is a Prejek Paddle Fish. It can be purchased for 8,000 credits, or 6,666 credits with a store discount.

text:
Buying Pets at Citadel Souvenirs Travel to the Citadel. The space station is located in the Serpent Nebula on the galaxy map. The galaxy map can be accessed on the Combat Information Center (CIC) deck of the Normandy. Go to Level 27 in the Zakera Ward. You can walk there or use a fast-travel transit terminal (found in various locations) to teleport there. Enter "Citadel Souvenirs" and access the terminal. If you have enough Renegade or Paragon points, speak to the shopkeeper about getting a store discount. Select the blue (Paragon) or red (Renegade) dialogue option to persuade her. Purchase pets from the item list. The prices for each pet are as follows:
Space Hamster can be bought for 9,200 credits, or 7,666 credits with a store discount. Illium Skald Fish and Thessian Sunfish can be bought for 500 credits, or 416 credits with a store discount. Note that the Thessian Sunfish will not appear in the store inventory until after you've completed the "Horizon" mission. Buying Pets at Memories of Illium Travel to llium. It is located in the Tasale System of the Crescent Nebula on the galaxy map. The galaxy map can be accessed on the CIC deck of the Normandy. Head to the door near the stairs that leads to Liara's office.  Walk through the docking authority section to the next door.  Go to the farthest kiosk on the left, located in the merchant's section.  Speak to Ereba, the Asari next to the kiosk. If you have enough points in either the Paragon or Renegade personality ranges, you can persuade her to deal with her boyfriend troubles. Both dialogue options lead her to give you the discount. Access the kiosk and choose the pet from the item list. The only pet available is a Prejek Paddle Fish. It can be purchased for 8,000 credits, or 6,666 credits with a store discount.
